name: Gran Ende III
description:
Anjie dreamed of working as a knight in the capital city.
However upon graduating from boot camp she got assigned to the "Border town Kayzelin".
Not happy with this unfortunate outcome she decide to do her best to gain a reputation so she could ask to get stationed it the capital again.

Luckily for her, she could team up with with Siska whom she also met when she arrived in Kayzelin.
But once the duo started working, they noticed something strange about their senior knights....
And when doubts turn into convictions they find themselves in a situation they could couldn't imagine....
​
